html:
9.6.24  12:25 pm   isn't money a fake concept anyways?

      no

9.6.24  12:18 pm   are you good enough for yourself or other people? 

      for fleeting moments yes

9.6.24  10:30 am   hey I'm having difficulty coming up with a question, could you ask yourself one?

      i do that all the time, but not on this page

9.6.24  10:14 am   how did you get so cool? did you just be yourself or something crazy like that?

      first you just have to spend a while figuring out what you even think is cool, and gradually it starts to emerge, but you can never really be sure if you're doing it right

9.6.24  10:01 am   what would be a hot topic to talk about in a debate?

      which way is up

9.6.24  9:34 am   how do i talk to people (like a person)

      no one knows, except people, and they don't even know until the moment they're doing it

9.6.24  7:59 am   will a soap tips 2 exist

      soap tips is already a sequel, to "hi, i'm steve", and the next one in the series would probably be the one where damien maymdien answers questions

9.6.24  5:24 am   do you really get turned on by the news when you turn on the news (and the news has more views because there's cool news on the news)?

      usually when i glance at news channels, the first thing i see is something scary. a lot of people keep watching because they're scared. that's why the news usually gets more views if they can find scarier things to put on. usually i try to stay out of it, but i loosely referred to this phenomenon in the song that you referenced above

9.6.24  3:44 am   advice on how to get through the 4 years of university as a freshmen?

      i don't know much about universities, but i think the only way to accomplish that is to switch universities every year

9.6.24  3:27 am   Sometimes I imagine us questioners here as your rubber ducks. And it makes me smile in a very happy way

      that's weird i was thinking i was the duck

9.6.24  1:45 am   Do you think familiarity begets connection or can you skip that bit and get down to the mirror neurons first?

      possibly both

9.6.24  12:44 am   would you endorse water

      sure

9.5.24  11:52 pm   why is it called last christmas when there's christmas every year

      in english, "last christmas" means "the most recent christmas". if you want to imply that there are none left, you'd probably have to say "the final christmas" or "the last christmas ever"

9.5.24  10:35 pm   how do i get over my feelings of jealousy which cause me to avoid listening to good jazz pianists?

      not necessary. you can just listen to all kinds of other music. that will certainly make you a stronger jazz pianist anyway

9.5.24  10:26 pm   The hippopotamus is the coolest animal and we can prove it with emetology.
"Hippopotamus" = "Hipper version of a Potamus".
"Potamus" (Latin) = "mouse that smokes pot" (English; literally translates as "pot mouse").
And what could be cooler than a mouse that smokes pot? The answer is a hipper potamus

      most of that is incorrect

9.5.24  10:06 pm   Why does the text in outside say "spaceshipp" instead of spaceship?

      maybe it's a brand name

9.5.24  10:01 pm   I'm thinking about going away and writing down on a pad of paper a list of 27 things i want to do today, but today is almost over. should I try again tomorrow?

      sure, but it doesn't have to be exactly 27

9.5.24  9:08 pm   I have reports of you saying, and I quote, "I write stupid music. And a lot of people like my music. Damn they must be stupid."

     that's not something i said, that's something i wrote into a song and then sung the song according to the way it was written melodically and chordally

     Still feel that way?

      i still feel confident about the way the song goes, but the most important thing about songs is that when you write the words on paper without the song, that is not the song

9.5.24  8:32 pm   do you put ice in your water

      i prefer to refrigerate it to a near ice temperature

9.5.24  8:06 pm   Is it ever possible to make a mistake?

      yes

9.5.24  7:56 pm   how do you start composing a song? do ideas pop into your head after seeing stuff in your everyday life?

      there are 2 ways to start -- they either start themselves unexpectedly, or i start them. In both cases, working on the rest of it is an entirely different job, for a different time

9.5.24  7:52 pm   hullo, in 'i like to wear soft clothing (cause it makes me feel like i'm rough, in comparison)', you leave a little gap without lyrics after "is that you on stage?", where you could have easily repeated that melody with something like "scanning along the first page" or something along those lines. Was this break from speaking intentional?

     was that question intentional

     Does it represent something, because I find it intruiging. maybe its just a place to relax?

     if it intruigues you, that alone is worth it. but the way these things work usually is i try to figure out how i want it to go. and then hopefully i find a way that i'd like it to go. For example, some people decorate their office with plants. but there are some parts of the office without plants. usually the reason is related to how they want the office to be

9.5.24  7:15 pm   If you could meet any person, alive, or dead, who would it be? What would you do with them/discuss with them?

      you, and whatever you wanna talk about

9.5.24  6:38 pm   who is your favorite us president

      i can't decide

9.5.24  5:12 pm   How to escape from hell

      any way you want to

9.5.24  4:07 pm   favourite mode of transport? (Other than sea urchin)

      land urchin

9.5.24  1:30 pm   If I could view every question on this page at the same time I believe that I would become omnipotent

      that's not true

9.5.24  1:03 pm   How do i come up with something new

      i have no idea, and neither will you when you do it. but if you want to convince yourself it's possible, then just watch other people doing it and then say to yourself "i'm a person too, i can do that too"

9.5.24  12:47 pm   do you like pepsi with pulp or no pulp?

      pepsi is supposed to have negative pulp. empty spaces in the drink

9.5.24  12:46 pm   may i please hear your 3 adjectives of the day

      huge, big, large,

9.5.24  12:21 pm   bill are slugs cool?

      they're supposed to be

9.5.24  12:04 pm   what are the types of questions you receive?

      in that case, there are 2 types of questions: questions about the questions and questions that are not about the questions

9.5.24  11:12 am   y red + white make pink but mayo + ketchup make light orange????????????

      one of your starting ingredients must have been yellower than you thought

9.5.24  10:20 am   Have you been betrayed, abandoned, or otherwise made an incoherent fool out of you?

      no

9.5.24  9:27 am   people around me keep telling me to "grow up" by either joining a military or "looking for a real job". how do i politely tell them i just want to focus on what makes me happy, and not what is considered "normal" by those people? (i live in a CIS country)

      you don't always have to explain yourself to everyone

9.5.24  9:26 am   Opinion on manifestoes, especially those written on a bus?

      sounds pretty chill

9.5.24  7:19 am   what would be the best pet dinosaur 

      the smallest

9.5.24  6:44 am   Do you think looking up is as scary as looking down

      it's more scary

9.5.24  5:42 am   what is a brief description of the math term distributive property

      x times (y plus z) will always be the same thing as (x times y) plus (x times z)

9.5.24  3:19 am   In soap tips, the guy said that soap is one of the cleaneast things in the world. What could possibly be cleaner than soap?

      nothing

9.5.24  2:23 am   hey bill, my birthday is coming up soon. any advice? 

      get older

9.5.24  1:41 am   how do you know if youre happy?

     most of the time you don't quite know

     i always feel like im hanging on a thread. do you crochet or would like to?

      i don't think so

9.5.24  1:38 am   Hi Bill, my last gave you the impression that I was trying to trick you so I will provide some context and maybe rephrase the question.

People listen to music for many different reasons. Almost always, some times of music illicit an emotional response. What sorts of responses does your music make you feel?

     i'm either extremely scared that i didn't make it good enough, or extremely excited that i made it great and i'm gonna do even better in the future

     And when other people share their own experiences with your music, does it make you feel less alone in the universe?

      yes

9.4.24  11:57 pm   help i dont know everything, how do i know everything with my dumbass brain

      maybe everything is the same. then you'd only have to learn 1 thing. it's worth a try

9.4.24  11:30 pm   how do i unclog my deep fryer ?

      i have no idea

9.4.24  10:53 pm   billll i feel like everyone doesnt like me and/or is disappointed in me... should i be eating more cheese?

      no, you are eating the right amount of cheese already. just kidding, i don't know this because you didn't provide me with that information

9.4.24  10:51 pm   How did you know I can relate to not being able to wait for the end of the world

      i don't know that

9.4.24  9:41 pm   Are you built to withstand every city in every nation?

      i'm not sure

9.4.24  9:08 pm   Do you think billionaires ever do laundry? Or do they just throw away their clothes at the end of the day because they can always just buy more clothes? 

      i found out recently that not all billionaires do the same thing

9.4.24  8:59 pm   have you ever tried walking to your fridge in one minute by taking 30 seconds to get halfway there, 15 to get another quarter of the way there, 7.5 to get an eighth closer, et cetera, until you take 0.00...1 seconds to get 0.00...1% closer?

      yes
